name: Official Development Assistance (ODA)
description: Grants or concessional loans from official sources aimed primarily at promoting the economic development and welfare of developing countries.

name: Other Official Flows (non-export credit)
description: Official government flows that do not meet ODA criteria, often less concessional and may serve commercial or foreign policy objectives.

name: Officially Supported Export Credits
description: Export-related loans backed by government guarantees or insurance, typically for tied aid or trade promotion.

name: Private Development Finance
description: Financial flows from NGOs, philanthropic foundations, and other civil society actors directed at development objectives.

name: Private Foreign Direct Investment
description: Long-term investments made by private firms in developing countries, usually involving ownership or control of enterprises.

name: Other Private Flows at Market Terms
description: Long-term capital flows from private investors or banks, including portfolio investments, not classified as foreign direct investment.

name: Non-Flow

name: Other Flows
description: Residual flows including non-ODA components of peacekeeping or development-related operations not primarily focused on aid.
